definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: Graphics on screen The Kingdom will return to Jerusalem and It will be ruled over by a marvellous King.
sentences.chinese: 神的国将回到耶路撒冷，由一位了不起的王作统治。

sentences.english: A | It is certainly a great way to monetize a community.
sentences.chinese: 它当然会成为这样一个社区内一个了不起的创意。

sentences.english: This was no mean feat for an article of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 这对一件衣服来说是非常了不起的。
一个很了不起的化学家。

sentences.english: A rich harvest in a hungry land is impressive.
sentences.chinese: 缺粮地区的一场丰收是了不起的。

sentences.english: English was his first language and he always had a terrific ear.
sentences.chinese: 英语是他的第一语言，而且他有一对了不起的耳朵。

sentences.english: It is a wonderful experience to travel through the desert by camel.
sentences.chinese: 骑坐骆驼穿越沙漠旅行是一次了不起的体验。

sentences.english: It is wonderful that you should have achieved so much these years.
sentences.chinese: 这几年你竟然取得如此大的成就，你真了不起。

sentences.english: That is to say, it's a wonderful axis of combination that you're looking at.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，你所看到的是一条了不起的组合轴。

sentences.english: To begin with, I still think Nausicaa is amazing.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我仍然认为《风之谷》是很了不起的。

sentences.english: There is an amazing story of a man who managed to stop a robberyx.
sentences.chinese: 有一个了不起的故事，是关于一个人阻止了一次抢劫。

sentences.english: They are nobodies who think they are somebodies.
sentences.chinese: 他们是一些自以为了不起的小人物。

sentences.english: It's fantastic because it all goes to charity.
sentences.chinese: 这太了不起了，因为它全都流向了慈善事业。

sentences.english: Crofts New Hall is an amazing concept.
sentences.chinese: 克萝芙新庄园是个了不起的概念。

sentences.english: He's a marvellous stricker of the ball with either foot.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个两脚都会控球并了不起的射手。

definition: not to accept as correct (idiom); to object/to disapprove/to take exception to
happy/glad/willing (to do sth)/in a cheerful mood
